name: Paul T. Frankl
biography: Paul Frankl was a design polymath—widely successful as an art historian, furniture designer, architect, painter, and gallerist. Despite the popularity of his modernist furniture designs, especially among Hollywood celebrities, he achieved his broadest impact through extensive writing on design, which shaped popular perceptions of the emerging modern styles of the 1930s and later.
biography_75_words: Paul Frankl was a design polymath—widely successful as an art historian, furniture designer, architect, painter, and gallerist. Despite the popularity of his modernist furniture designs, especially among Hollywood celebrities, he achieved his broadest impact through extensive writing on design, which shaped popular perceptions of the emerging modern styles of the 1930s and later.
biography_50_characters: Design polymath influential in American modernism
